attributes.additional_details:
Child abusers, molesters and murderers recieve pitiful sentences for harming/ destroying lives of innocent children and their families.

Abusers and molesters should serve at least a minimum of ten years in jail without parole or bail, and should be put on a sex offenders register with extreme limitations.

Child killers should be jailed for life with bail or parole offered after they have served ten or more years in jail.
